p.o: Dr. Brown, late of St. John’s, Glasgow.
Mr. Peter M‘Bride late of Rothsay.
Rev. Alex. Stewart, late of Cromarty, son of Dr. Stewart,—first of Moulin, in Athol, and latterly of the Cannongate, Edinburgh.
Mr. John Macdonald, late Missionary at Calcutta, son of the late Dr. Macdonald of Urquhart.
